gpt_comment: [FULL] All available sources agree with the baseline: sunny day in Paris with no chance of rain and average temperature around 6.2°C. Meteoblue also indicates sunny weather but does not provide temperature or rain data. Perfect day for a stroll in the park, just like a bumblebee buzzing from flower to flower in the spring sun.
